footer.disclaimer: Rocky Linux® 是 Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation 在美國及其他國家/地區的註冊商標。Linux® 是 Linus Torvalds 在美國及其他國家/地區的註冊商標。Red Hat Enterprise Linux、RHEL 和 CentOS 是 Red Hat, Inc. 或其子公司在美國及其他國家/地區的商標或註冊商標。我們與 Red Hat, Inc. 無任何隸屬、認可或贊助關係。

hero.title: Enterprise Linux, the community way.
hero.description: Rocky Linux is an open-source enterprise operating system designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Red Hat Enterprise Linux®. Rocky Linux is under intensive development by the community.

features.title: 無論何時，堅如磐石！
features.description: Rocky Linux rebuilds sources directly from RHEL®, so you can bet your best dollar that you'll have a super stable experience, no matter the use-case.

productionReady.name: Production Ready
productionReady.description: Rocky Linux 適合企業級環境使用，提供堅實的穩定性、定期更新及10年維護期，全免費。

communitySupported.name: 社群支援
communitySupported.description: 社群、贊助商和合作夥伴已作出長期承諾，確保項目能夠長期留在社群中。

easyMigration.name: Easy Migration
easyMigration.description: Migrate from other Enterprise Linux distributions without sweating it. We provide an easy-to-use migration script, free of charge.

news.title: 最新消息
news.description: 我們定期與社群分享最新動態，以下為最新的消息。

news.title: 最新消息
news.description: 關注 Rocky Linux 社群的最新消息與動態。

mastodon.name: Mastodon
mastodon.url-valid: Please enter a valid Mastodon instance URL (without https://).

about.title: 關於我們

headings.title: 一切起始於一則部落格留言。
headings.subTitle: 歷史

about.intro: On December 8, 2020, Red Hat announced that they would discontinue development of CentOS, which has been a production-ready downstream version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux, in favor of a newer upstream development variant of that operating system known as "CentOS Stream". In response, the original founder of CentOS, Gregory Kurtzer, announced <link>via a comment on the CentOS website</link> that he would again start a project to achieve the original goals of CentOS. Its name was chosen as a tribute to early CentOS co-founder Rocky McGaugh. By December 12, the code repository of Rocky Linux had become the top-trending repository on GitHub.
about.releaseInfo: On December 22, 2020, Rocky Linux announced that the target for an initial release was anywhere between March and May of 2021. On January 20, 2021, it was announced that a test repository would be made available to the public by the end of February, and a release candidate was on target for the end of March 2021. However, that date was slightly pushed back, and on April 30, 2021, the first release candidate was officially released. The second release candidate, of version 8.4, the last before the stable release, was released on June 4, 2021. On June 21, 2021, the stable release of Rocky Linux 8.4 was released, with the code name "Green Obsidian".

organizationInfo.title: 團體
organizationInfo.info: Rocky Linux 項目由 Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation (RESF) 托管。請參閱<0>頁面了解更多組織結構的相關資訊。

quote.quote: 回想起早期的CentOS時光，我的聯合創辦人Rocky McGaugh，他如今已不在人世，未能見證CentOS的成功，因此作為對他的致敬，我向大家介紹Rocky Linux。
quote.author: Gregory Kurtzer

sponsors.title: 贊助商
sponsors.description: 由衷感謝贊助商的慷慨支持，才能有Rocky Linux。

partners.title: 合作夥伴
partners.description: Rocky Linux非常榮幸能與以下組織合作，由衷感謝他們的慷慨支持，才能有Rocky Linux。

supportProviders.title: 商業支持
supportProviders.description: 以下贊助商為 Rocky Linux 提供商業支持服務。

shop.title: Official Merchandise
shop.description: 點擊此處購買周邊商品！所有供應商均提供全球配送。

download.title: 下載
download.description: 點擊此處下載最新版Rocky Linux 。

tooltips.dvd: DVD: Seamless installation, everything you need is included.
tooltips.boot: Boot: Minimal image for a custom, internet-based installation.
tooltips.minimal: Minimal: Minimal, self-contained image for offline system setup.

getInvolved.title: 加入我們
getInvolved.text: 當您下載使用Rocky Linux時，Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation邀請您成為社群的貢獻者。您可以透過多種方式做出貢獻，從編寫文檔、QA、測試，為SIGs進行程式碼更改、提供鏡像或託管以及協助其他用戶。

exportCompliance.title: Export Compliance/Customs Information
exportCompliance.text1: 下載 Rocky Linux 軟體即表示您已了解以下所有內容：
exportCompliance.text2: Rocky Linux software and technical information may be subject to the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (the “EAR”) and other U.S. and foreign laws and may not be exported, re-exported or transferred (a) to a prohibited destination country under the EAR or U.S. sanctions regulations (currently Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, and the Crimea Region of Ukraine, subject to change as posted by the United States government); (b) to any prohibited destination or to any end user who has been prohibited from participating in U.S. export transactions by any federal agency of the U.S. government; or (c) for use in connection with the design, development or production of nuclear, chemical or biological weapons, or rocket systems, space launch vehicles, or sounding rockets, or unmanned air vehicle systems.
exportCompliance.narrative: Rocky Linux in source code and binary code form is publicly available and is not subject to the EAR in accordance with §740.17(b)(1).
exportCompliance.product_text: Rocky Linux. Includes Rocky Linux Project "Special Interest Group" repositories.

community.title: 歡迎加入我們！
community.description: 選擇您有興趣的領域，我們會引導您找到合適的資源。
community.noSelection: Select an option to see more details.

chatting.title: Just chatting
chatting.description: You can join the conversation on our <link>Mattermost</link> chat to connect with others in the community. Have fun!

bugs.title: 回報問題
bugs.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> to talk over your potential bug with the team and other community members. Search our <link2>bug tracker</link2> to see if there's an existing report for your issue.

webdev.title: 網頁開發
webdev.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> and introduce yourself in the <link2>~Web</link2> channel. Search our <link3>website repository</link3> to see if there are issues/enhancements that need to be made. Make them!

graphics.title: Graphic design
graphics.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> and introduce yourself in the <link2>~Design</link2> channel. Let us know what you're interested in working on, and we'll find something you can help out with!

release.title: Release engineering
release.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> and introduce yourself in the <link2>~Development</link2> channel. Let us know what you're interested in working on, and we'll find something you can help out with!

sig.title: Special Interest Group (SIG)
sig.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> and introduce yourself in one of our many SIG channels. Let us know what you're interested in working on, and we'll find something you can help out with! If you're interested in proposing a new SIG, please see our <link2>wiki page</link2> on the topic.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Join our <link1>Mattermost chat</link1> and introduce yourself in the <link2>~Documentation</link2> channel. Make sure to review the contributing guide available on our <link3>README</link3>.
